Welcome to Crypto Analyzer's documentation!¶

Module for main program of analysing crypto currencies

modules.main.approx_price()¶

Render page with form, where user can write needed price

modules.main.approx_price_answer()¶

Define all crypto currencies with closest price to needed one and render html page with results.

modules.main.checkInput(userInput, kind_)¶

Check user's input. :param userInput: str :return: bool

modules.main.emergence()¶

Define frequency of adding crypto currencies to system and render appropriate page with diagram and table.

modules.main.existence_circulation()¶

Define quantity of existing coins and circulating ones of all crypto currencies. Create dataFrame and render html page with it.

modules.main.main_page()¶

Render main page

modules.main.mining_companies()¶

Define top of companies and wallets and extract needed information with API. Build bar charts according to their rating and create dataFrame with general info. Render html page with results.

modules.main.price_change()¶

Render page with form where user can write crypto currencies he wants to receive result of

modules.main.price_change_answer()¶

Define changes in needed crypto currency price for last day and for last week. Build scatter chart with given result and render appropriate html page.

Module for creating adt based on Dynamic Array

class modules.crypto_adt.Company(name)¶

Class for minimg company object representation

get_country()¶

Return country of the company or wallet :return: str

get_rate()¶

Return country of the company :return:

get_totalUsers()¶

Return quantity of users of the company or wallet :return: int

isRecommended()¶

Define whether company is recommended. :return: bool

set_info(type_)¶

Set country of the company and its average rating. :return: NoneType

class modules.crypto_adt.CryptoInfo¶

Class for representation adt for needed information based on array

approximatePrice(price)¶

Define cryptocurrencies with price that is approximate to needed and return list of them. :param price: float :return: list

companies(companyData)¶

Define top mining companies and wallets

define_frequency()¶

Define frequency of adding cryptocurrencies to system. :return: list, list

get_array()¶

Return array with names of all cryptocurrencies. :return: DynamicArray

get_circulation()¶

Define how many coins of needed cryptocurrency are in circulation now and return list with numbers :return: list

get_existence()¶

Define how many coins of needed cryptocurrency exist now and return list with numbers :return: list

price_change(name)¶

Define changes in price of needed cryptocurrency :param name: :return: list, list, list, list

put_information(crypto_dict)¶

Add all the information to allData array. Add all cryptocurrencies to cryptoArray. Add dates when cryptocurrencies were added to dates array. Add all dates to onlyDates list. :return: NoneType

class modules.crypto_adt.Cryptocurrency(name, data)¶

Class for cryptocurrency representation

get_circulation_num()¶

Define and return number of coins in circulation. :return: int

get_existence_num()¶

Define and return number of coins that exist at the moment. :return: int

get_price(type_)¶

Define and return price of the cryptocurrency. :return: int

Module for representation of Dynamic array

class modules.dynamic_array.DynamicArray¶

A dynamic array class akin to a simplified Python list.

append(obj)¶

(DynamicArray, object) -> NoneType Add object to end of the array.

insert(k, value)¶

(DynamicArray, int, int) -> NoneType Insert value at index k, shifting subsequent values rightward.

remove(value)¶

(DynamicArray, int) -> NoneType Remove first occurrence of value( or raise ValueError).

api.crypto_api.get_information()¶

(NoneType) -> Get information using api and write into the file.

api.company_api.get_information()¶

(NoneType) -> Get information using api and write into the file.
